website_summaries.verdict: Extremely popular machine comes as an 8-piece kit including nutritional information.
pros: Highly efficient blade design and cyclone technology maximise juice extraction
Easy to use and straightforward to clean
cons: A small percentage leak or stop working after less than 12 months

customer_reviews.title: A great bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: A great bit of kit and a terrific deal for the 8 piece - cheaper than Amazon's 5 piece and the extra bits are useful, eg the extra cup and stay fresh lid. Ignore the silly reviews that claim it leaks or cuts fingers; the instructions are clear and unambiguous. Makes great smoothies and is so easy to clean. Owners' videos on YouTube helpful. Always add water up to the Max line. Don't pack ingredients too tightly. Shake before juicing. I haven't used the recipe book yet - use your imagination, your taste buds and what's in your fridge. Only way I'll eat kale, carrots, beetroot, lemon juice and ginger first thing in the morning. Superb.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Fusspot

customer_reviews.title: The best in the market
customer_reviews.text: I was going to wait until the 900 series was available on Amazon, even if it was more expensive. In the end, I didn’t want to wait and so I ordered the 600 series. This is our second Nutribullet and we are not disappointed. Makes delicious smoothies (and pina coladas :-) ) in seconds and is easy to clean. I would not hesitate to recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Capricapers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for smoothies and diet milkshakes
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic gadget which gets lots of use. Ideal for smoothies and mixing diet milkshakes such as Exante. It cuts through ice well. This is the second Nutribullet which I have purchased as the first one became difficult to attach the cups to, it kept jamming. It did last about three years though. I wouldn’t recommend putting the blender tops in a dishwasher as they accumulate water inside. The actual cups wash well in the dishwasher. Easy to use but may be a problem if you have very weak hands or wrists as you need to twist the cups onto the machine. I recommend this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver - For those who don't like eating fruit: drink it!
customer_reviews.text: Every year at my mandatory health and lifestyle check the doctor urges me to eat more fruit and greens. Thing is, I hate eating and preparing fruit - peeling it, cutting it too pieces and getting your hands dirty - all too much to bother given I don’t particularly like the taste of most fruits. So we tried the Nutribullet a few years ago as an alternative. And it didn't take much to find an easy tastefull blend with hidden greens. So this is what we now have almost every day. Recently bought this slightly updated Nutribullet as the former one is now being used in our holiday home.
customer_reviews.author: Djilly L.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but very difficult to slot the cups into place
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful blender and even works well when making breadcrumbs. 2 issues are that it can only be switched on from the wall so make sure it's not switched on when you are trying to put the cup into place - and I say that because it's hard to get the cups to slot in. I don't think I would buy this again for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great blender, great price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blender. I got mine for £60 in September last year and have used it almost everyday since. This blender is fantastic and very quick (although it is very loud but that can be expected). Occasionally, the screw on blade isn’t screwed tight enough so the smoothie leaks whilst blending but this has only happened a handful of times and is my fault but it is something to be careful about. Also I wish it came with a lid with a flip top so I could drink directly out of the lid rather than the cup itself. Other than that it is great and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This blender is great until it doesnt work anymore and requires your whole bpody weight to push the cup down enough to make it blend. This has happened right after our warrenty ran out. Very dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Really Awful
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if its a default but its incredibly difficult to use. I'm a big juicer/smoothie person and I always use a blender (specifically the Retro Super Blend Blender by Jason vale). I am very unhappy with this and most likely just going to throw it in the bin... so bad that I can't give it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Romane Howsam

customer_reviews.title: Broken after two months of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender for my daughter as a Christmas gift. This item broke after two months of use and Amazon have FAILED to arrange for the return and replacement of this item despite me contacting them numerous times via both chat and telephone calls. Promised three times it would be sorted out and three times nothing was done. I will not be buying from amazon again. Customer services do not seem to be able to cope with simple problems. Very disappointed as I am a long term customer. Bye bye Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wrighton

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says, excellent blender.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I bought, the first was for myself, the next for my son and this one I sent from the UK to my partner as a gift. It's an excellent blender from a world famous brand. If you like me enjoy nutritious smoothies this blender does the job in seconds. I like it's practically since after itv blends your favourite fruit and vegetables you can just drink it out of the cup used to blend it, store it in the fridge or take it to work or picnics and camping, that's how versitile it is. I also was impressed by how fast Amazon delivered this product abroad for me.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with the service from Amazon and the product. Firstly the product was left on the doorstep in its original box (without amazon packaging) without an email or knock on the door to say that it had been delivered. I then opened the product to find that it did not work. When plugged in, the product started emitting a burning smell and smoke from the motor within seconds. I have tried the product in multiple pug sockets and the same problem occurs. From the way the product was packaged in the box, it looked like I had been sent a defected product that had been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Broken, manufacturing flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived unusable. Connectiin of the blade to the drive shaft loose, not welded or connected so the motor did not turn the blades. A clear manufacturing flaw. Returned product. Won't chance Nutribullet again (sorry I could not find a batch number for readers of this review to be wary of). Back to the trusty old Salter 1000.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stephen Van Vloten

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This must be the best money spent ever. I ordered it on Friday, and got delivered the next day before midday. Amazing service. It’s not only good for shakes and smoothies, but when I made an iced coffee this afternoon I noticed perfectly frothed milk... I think it would be ideal for making cappuccino/latte at home too!
customer_reviews.author: Ewelina

customer_reviews.title: I use it every day and love it. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, works very well and it well thought out in its design. The accompanying recipe book is very useful for getting you started in understanding how to make balanced juice drinks. I chose this product because I like to have all the fibre etc from the fruit and veg, not just the juice. If you just want juice this is not for you. I love experimenting with this, and every time I learn something new. It is such an easy way to eat much more healthily. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant device! So quick and easy to use, and even easier to clean. The two cups it comes with are well made, and the different sizes means you can have either a large or smaller smoothie depending on your hunger. I've kept the larger one for me and hubby, and the small one is being used for baby. The cup handle it comes with is again useful as it reduces the need for another glass and hence more washing up. Very effective and efficient. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A.F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product - tasty juice, easy to clean and reduces waste
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Now have fresh juice most mornings, which is obviously a great way to start the day. Also really easy to clean, which is a big problem that I’ve had with other juicers. But the thing that I love the most is that I don’t waste fruit any more - whenever fruit is getting a bit soft or I’m going away and have fruit close to its “use by date”, I just chop it up and chuck it in the freezer, so I can juice it at any time (before I would have chucked it in the bin)
customer_reviews.author: mikelebus

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy machine, well built and solid. Grinds food up fast but if you're looking for extra smooth smoothies you won't get them as you are still left with the tiny strawberry pips/ slightly gritty texture. Upon saying that, this machine is far superior to many others on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K. Tait

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this blender in October however I only started to use it a few weeks ago. And yesterday broke. By only blending boiled vegetables for my daughter's puree. Very disappointed. Considering how much it costs it is no value for money
customer_reviews.author: Iona

customer_reviews.title: Makes my smoothies, sauces, and soups a breeze ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes my smoothies, sauces, and soups a breeze to make - I will never use a traditional blender again if I can help it! Be careful if you are being a bit cheeky and wizzing hot food, as the steam builds up quickly and makes the container very difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: Dec

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is when you turn the switch on in the wall the product blends, there is no button on the product as soon as the plug goes in the product blends. Can be a hazard for users. I hope they improve this as it can be dangerous for people unaware.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Durable, convenient & versatile blender
customer_reviews.text: We love our nutribullet!! We have bought two of these, upgrading when a new one came out. We absolutely love our nutribullet and use it for everything--smoothies, soups, salad dressing, mashed potatoes, hummus, guacamole... you name it! I cant recommend this nutribullet enough. It is very durable and long lasting, and the travel containers are so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Claregrb

customer_reviews.title: Good, fast food blender, easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: It's simple to operate, comes with clear instructions, was bigger than I thought it was going to be. I don't think it would be wise putting anything hot in the beakers as I suspect it would warp them, so everything needs to go in cold. It makes handful of vegetables go a long way so is good for a bit of household economy as well as delivering nutritional benefit. If it's not too silly to say, you can feel the ease of digestibility of veg you might otherwise have struggled over espacially when you're an old codger like me. .
customer_reviews.author: D. J. B. James

customer_reviews.title: Rubber seal around cutter came away mid blend
customer_reviews.text: Was great until the rubber seal came off in the blender - mid blend and cut up the rubber seal now unusable!! I purchased in March this year
customer_reviews.author: Minnie1243

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying a Nutribullet. They are great quality, easy to use and quick to clean. I use mine every morning and sometimes for a post gym smoothie. Since I have had it I have felt healthier and energised from my daily smoothies. The blade quickly blends up fruits into a smooth, clump free tasty smoothie! Love the bonus nutrition and vitamins guide inside and the mini container with a lid for storing left over smoothie for later. Keep up the great work Nutribullet!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kitchen kit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a good price on Amazon with next day delivery. The Nutribullit does everything it says on the box. It’s good looking enough to leave on the kitchen worktop for easy access. We use it most days and the only negative is that I had to buy the Nutribullit smoothie recipe book separately. This is much smaller than I was expecting, with no pictures, and I think it should come gratis with the blender.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Davies

customer_reviews.title: Nutribullet Juicer 600 Series
customer_reviews.text: The best juicer as far as I am concerned. Even my 9 year old granddaughter finds it easy to use. Powerful and versatile. The 600 Series model gives a choice of two cup sizes. I would recommend this model as it is powerful enough to deal with course vegetables like celery. A Recipe booklet is enclosed which makes juicing choices an effortless procedure. Ideal for soups and fruity drinks like smoothies. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S

customer_reviews.title: An easy way to healthier eating
customer_reviews.text: The second Nutribullet I’ve bought and has transformed my eating habits (in a good way!). I make two drinks each day: 1) late morning, 3 tablespoons pinhead oats + banana, frozen raspberries & blueberries + some sunflower & pumpkin seeds mixed into oat milk. 2) late afternoon, spinach, banana, frozen fruit mixed into almond milk. Drinks are delicious and help towards my ‘5 a day’ and I’m hoping that the porridge morning drink will help lower bad cholesterol and the spinach drink will help my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: valleyhill

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few if the cheaper ones... Don't bother. If you follow the instructions you won't have a problem with the 600w bullet. The quality of this vs same price and cheaper versions is way higher, you can tell from the time required to create a very smooth healthy beverage. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: adam j ellis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect job
customer_reviews.text: Top one on my kitchen plot . It’s really do perfect job. Before I buy it I was researched for whole week to compare brands and models . I am 100% sure this Nutribullet is the best choice I ever made. Everything you fill in after 1 min going to perfect smother beverage , healthy drinks goo for whole family including my baby. also btw I make pancakes inside it 🤪 or any another mixing well ingredients. I am absolutely happy with it .
customer_reviews.author: Draganka

customer_reviews.title: Small, cute and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived the very next day! I have been using it on a daily basis and found it to be very efficient at blending; only needing about 30 seconds or so to reduce the contents of a container to a smooth tasty shake. Apart from the smell from the motor, all seems to be working well as described. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Daywalker233

customer_reviews.title: Powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: Much more powerful than the previous one We got (burn out for some reason) and twice more expensive of course, but works great. Really like the fact that this model start with push and twist, so the top part clips in place and You don’t need to hold your hand and push down at all time in order to have it work. Easy to clean. I hope this one stay alive for longer
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love my nutribullet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I wanted to be able to make my own smoothies and up my veggie intake. Had this for about three weeks now and I have been using it most days each week. Simple to use and I find it easy to clean - just got to make sure the extractor blade is screwed tightly onto the cup or you will experience leakage. Enjoyed the fresh smoothies and I think my skin looks better and I feel like my energy levels have also improved slightly. I haven't been craving unhealthy foods as much too since using. Glad I invested in this item so I hope it doesn't break anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Hello I loved my product but it stopped working yesterday and smelled ...
customer_reviews.text: Hello I loved my product but it stopped working yesterday and smelled of smoke ! How do I send it back I was really concerned it was going to blow up!!! I love the Nutri Bullet and need a replacement please. Didn’t know how to private message I did try
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mark

customer_reviews.title: As fantastic as I hoped!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after doing a bit of research on juicers/blenders and I have to say - I have absolutely no regrets! I've had it for a few weeks now and have used it every day. You can make a big or small, add granola, seeds, stick the fruit in with its skin on, etc. It can handle it! So easy to wash up too. Really love the fact it doesn't take up too much space as I have a small kitchen. I just cannot recommend this highly enough if you are looking for a quick and easy juicer! Go for it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Used this every day since purchase and it has served me very well making smoothies out of frozen and fresh fruit. I've seen lots of reviews mention leakage and difficulty cleaning but, based on my experience, I question how this is possible and whether these are due to improper use. The only issue I've had is when giving a thorough clean the rubber seal can slip off from the blade chamber but this is easily pulled and prodded back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick Guyver

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of kit. Thought this would be a good way of eating healthier (more fruit and veg) but was told by a doctor that blending or juicing releases the natural sugars (fructose ) and it's healthier eating the fruit and veg as is :( . Still this makes brilliant smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: P A Powney

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Shhhhhhhh , dont tell everyone !. no use whatsoever and its making me skinny !!. Have used this everyday for a month now, replaced breakfast and lunch with Bullet mix and have lost 10 lbs in weight. Gonna get rid of it. Its costing me a fortune in new clothes. On the serious side, do'nt waste time thinking about it , just buy it. Best bit of kit on the market.
customer_reviews.author: RWH

customer_reviews.title: I can honestly say that I have used it almost every day since it arrived and it is so easy to use and to clean
customer_reviews.text: I had heard so much about the Nutribullet and was a sceptic, it's true, but I gave in and bought one. I can honestly say that I have used it almost every day since it arrived and it is so easy to use and to clean. The favourite are smoothies, but I have pureed sauces, ground nuts and coffee, and pulses. Nothing seems to defeat it, you just bung it in, and it does it quickly with ease. Love it !!
customer_reviews.author: cornishmaid

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I have had the blender for more than a month and I'm very impressed how easy it is to use it and clean. I have started eating more vegetables thanks to putting them into my smoothies. I used to avoid celery and spinach and now I have them on a regular basis. I have definitely changed my diet for the better thanks to the NutriBullet.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Really fantastic product. Comes with recipes and is easy to assemble and use. Very versatile you can use this for smoothies, margaritas etc. Cleaning is a doddle and would highly recommend this. Best feature is the ability to easily handle frozen fruit - many market alternatives aren’t as strong with this. A present well received
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend it !
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with me NutriBullet 600 series it is faster and much more powerful then others juice extractors or blenders used before , Easily in seconds is blending any sort of carotes and any others vegetables , Easy to use by anyone , solid , good and safe structure , Good value for the money as technology incorporated if priced dubled is still good value if this is the price to be healthy and keep the doctor away , I confess that I became highly addicted of me NutriBullet and that I will used every day , Is a good investment in health I strongly recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: G. Aragia

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for smoothie making (does not do food processing stuffs or hot food). I have a banana frozen berry oats & soy milk smoothie in the morning takes no time and easy to wash up. My only criticism is it is a bit loud but I guess all these things are. I don’t know why you’d go for a more powerful version
customer_reviews.author: Jezza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the lazy/bad eater
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the lazy/bad eater. Delicious Blasts with all the nutrients needed by mixing and matching. Easy to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: j m ray

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one - it's, like, just, 'THE BEST'.
customer_reviews.text: OMG - this is SSOOOO easy to use. It shreds stuff beyond belief. It's easy. It's quick. It's efficient. It's so damned easy to clean. BOTH of my teenage daughters L-O-V-E it. They're experimenting with new combos of fruit veg (and, occasionally, booze). Actually, bl**dy great for cocktails. Costing me a sodding fortune in fruit and I'm loving every penny. Thank you so much. NUTRiBULLET.
customer_reviews.author: DeanO

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Wish I got it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: So happy to finally have a Bullet! I’ve had an array of cheaper blenders, which never gave me the consistency I love for my smoothies. When I got the nutribullet I realised how necessary a good blender is - and it’s worth the extra cash. It’s also great for home made sauces, and even banana ice cream (I chill bananas and then blend them - and pop that in the freezer! Boom - banana ice cream). Treat yourself - get a good blender like this one!
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: Superb machine easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased with just the two cups which are perfect for me. Can fill large container and what is over, can be transferred to smaller one. Amazed at how quickly it can pruduce the mixture of fruit and,/or veg. If you use frozen fruit this very quickly comes to a pulp and has been superb for the hot summer days this year. Will have a go at soup now and can see no.reason why this would not work a treat. Great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary L.

customer_reviews.title: So simple
customer_reviews.text: My old blender died, it had loads of buttons and functions and really, I didn't use any of them! I love this, pop it in, twist and go. Only down size is I would need a bigger cup which I'm going to research where I can buy this separately because my husband keeps over filling it despite me telling him not to. Makes lovely smooth smoothies and pastes even when using nuts. Perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. H. Glibbery

customer_reviews.title: Best gadget I have (and I have many)
customer_reviews.text: Had other blenders but this is so much more so easy and quick to use didn’t think I like smoothies now I am addicted. Quick smoothly before work no problems. No need to peel fruit it crunches ice. Would recommend to anyone.on the go and little time for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: brenda maddison

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: this was a replacement for a similar product but different brand, I had previously though my old product was great until i got this one, this is defiantly really easy to clean and a lot quieter than my old product. I wish I had bought this one initially. I make a lot of smoothies with this, I have also made humous and pesto. i have a small kitchen too with limited worktop space so this is a great size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking on first use
customer_reviews.text: Please don't ignore this review because you think I'm annoyed. I saw that this product has great reviews and ignored the lower rating comments. I received it last night and used it for the first time this morning. Upon usage, it was leaking all over through the base!!! Luckily I can get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: L.D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I Bought it to replace my broken old ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I Bought it to replace my broken old one. I wish Nutrition Bullet though would mark the Full line better than with tiny black letters, when fruit and everything is in there you can’t find it!!
customer_reviews.author: R SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Love this product !
customer_reviews.text: I really am pleased with this - I use it twice a day for smoothies / protein shakes and my daughter is often making herself healthy blends with it. The best thing is how easy it is to clean between uses - as with other models which are not so quick & easy to clean, you tend to get put off and the whole thing gets put away in a cupboard. It looks nice too - would definitely recommend,
customer_reviews.author: JLR1976

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I love my nutribullet,easy to use,easy to clean,does what it says on the tin. The other juicer I had was difficult to clean this one is so much easier to use and clean,so happy with my purchase,I looked at the other reviews before I purchased, they were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jinty

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money you can get
customer_reviews.text: After reading a few of the reviews, all I can say is that people are exagerating about a few things. Firstly this is by far one of the safest smoothie makers you can use purely because of how you turn it on by pushing the whole cup down and twisting. Secondly this is really easy to clean, the blades can be rinsed with running water. Thirdly the blades can chop pretty much anything up that can be made into a smoothie. Comes with 2 cups obviously, but I personally have not used the small one. The handle it comes with is practical.
customer_reviews.author: Szilard Kuti

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: So I've been used to using the Breville smoothie maker, which is about 30 pounds cheaper but has a weaker engine. Just made two smoothies for my family and god I recommend this if you're used to using the breville maker. It's SO good. It even blends the smaller pips so the entire thing is smooth and creamy! I'm very happy with this and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blends very quickly/very smooth!
customer_reviews.text: This surpassed my expectations and made me realise how rubbish my previous smoothie maker was. It blitzes smoothie in seconds! My only issue is I would rather it had a button than was operated by pushing the blending cup down, as I want to store the blades in it whilst it's off-but this functionality makes it dangerous. However that being said I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant!! Have been a smoothie fan for years using a Warring blender. Also put up with the lumps! But no more - the Nutribullet makes everything smooth and delicious. We all love it!! Thanks Nutribullet.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blender, rubbish cup leaks
customer_reviews.text: The nutribullet is incredible, super quick, super efficient and the advice available straight from the leaflets given are great. One but tho, is that the lid leaks! I had the searchable cup in my bag and for some reason bits of liquid manage to escape. I took it out of my bag and gave it a shake and it does appear to bring through small amounts of water which for someone who carries a lot of paper work is a real shame since the blender itself is superb.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, best purchase this year
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is so easy to use and clean. Just rinse with warm water immediately after and shake with a bit of soap and the blade screwed on, rinse and done! I mainly purchased to include more healthy snacks in mine and my family's day, especially my daughter. She's 10 and rejects most vegetables and many fruits/nuts. With this bad boy you just put it all the ingredients together and blend into a smoothie and she loves it! #parenthack ;)
customer_reviews.author: Janna Yore

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. Easy to clean, good fun making new flavour smoothies and even make iced coffee in it for my husband! I then use some of the smoothie I made to pour into ice lolly moulds. Delicious! Also a very speedy process.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Excellent Excellent. Simple to use, great results. It's early days but I'm happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: miss I cesay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome in every way
customer_reviews.text: I read soooo many reviews and descriptions of other blenders before settling on this one. I am delighted with it! Our family uses it daily. We mainly use frozen fruit to make smoothies but have also made frothy, thick milkshakes too! An awesome bit of kit. Extremely easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant...but..
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It’s so easy to use. Looks good. The ONLY thing that frustrates me is cleaning the blades after each use. It’s incredibly difficult getting under them to ensure it’s clean...I’m worried I’ll slice my fingers off! But besides that I’m really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Y.H

customer_reviews.title: Great Price great product
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the new Nutribullit blender for twice the price and returned it as it broke ,I then got this...agaon ,I have to say that the orig nutribullet is the best ...for everything , cant go wrong...I had my 1st in 2013 for 6 years before it broke and I spilled god knows how much liquid on it ...So for under 60 quid this is fab if it last as long...? £10 a year! ...I really cant afford a fab £500 blender .... as much as Id like one so why pay more ?.....unless your catering for numbers ....this will do all you need
customer_reviews.author: Helen Louise Jones

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment i've made in a looong time. perfect for soups, smoothies, sorbet, milkshakes, protein shakes and breaking up small pieces of biscuits for cheesecake base!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Turner

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - bought to replace my worst ever product purchase - Tefal Blendforce
customer_reviews.text: Just bought to replace a Tefal product that uses some weird open/close mechanism for the blades. Great until you blend ice or somehting more than soft fruit and it deposits the contents on the worktop. Anyhoo, the Nutribullet is working perfectly and happily blending everything I put in it. Great example of good product design and really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Returned for refund
customer_reviews.text: V.good but not what I needed,and so sent it back for a refund,and that was O.K.,it was Kenwood,and thats now whats I have got,only for more functions.........C.G.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Nutribullet really is Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: The Nutribullet really is a great product. I have benign seeing it advertise on TV for about weeks and I found myself more and more intrigued. I made a decision if it was sold on Amazon I would buy one. One of the best decisions I have made. It does everything they said it would, how offen can you say that about an impulse buy? Not very often in my case. I am really happy with my Nutribullet, It is really easy to use and comes with some great interchangeable accessories. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr cool

customer_reviews.title: Nutribullet broke after one month
customer_reviews.text: Mine nutribullet stopped working out of sudden, only purchased it one month ago. I was shocked!!! It is still spinning, but not blending anything. I throw away the box, however I think it's unacceptable for product to stop working after one month. Is there any way I can contact seller for refund or replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Zuzana

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: I use to add depth to protein shakes, nuts and salads etc does a great job. I put the blades top shelf of the dishwasher and on a number of occasions the base has filled with water and needs to strip down to dry out. If not the bearing will corrode and fail. Small issue but its there non the less.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not good for ice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily to crush up ice for iced coffee but it cannot do this properly. You get half huge lumps, and half mush. I tried with small ice cubes too but it still wouldn't work. Also, the design looks like a 1980s Amstrad music centre - very old fasioned, and not in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jane C Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended to me and I LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me and I LOVE it! I've made some lovely smoothies (and some not so good ones) but I'm still learning. What I really I really appreciate though is how quick and easy it is to clean!! I've seen some smoothies brought in by work colleagues made in a blender and they look watery and filled with pulpy stuff that sinks to the bottom of the receptacle they bring it in. This product doesn't do that - it mixes everything up and I can bring it to work in the same cup I make it in. Brilliant. Very highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Orchid

customer_reviews.title: Cant live without it now
customer_reviews.text: Love this, the best purchase of the year so far. This blends almost anything into a lovely smooth drink. You do need to add enough liquid though. Bought alongside Jason Vale's 'Super Blend Me' book. Lost 10lb in 9 weeks and feel so much better
customer_reviews.author: Susie70

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good value & investment for the future
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought a nutribullet from high street tv when they were initially produced & it came with several blades & lids which I gave to a friend & decided to purchase another. Amazon's nutribullet was cheaper than what I initially paid & had just one extracted blade & lids. It works amazingly & would buy it again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning is a doddle. Using is a doddle. I’ve never consumed so much frozen fruit... I was recommended this product due to its ease of use and ease of cleaning/maintenance. I was well informed and I’ve enjoyed using the blender. It also encourages me to get my five a day because (at the risk of repeating myself) it’s so easy to use... Buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Hughesy A J S

customer_reviews.title: It does do what it says but I was left disappointed when my first one failed after less than six ...
customer_reviews.text: I have re-ordered another of this product and use it three times a week. It does do what it says but I was left disappointed when my first one failed after less than six months. Will see how long this one last. I did not keep the box or details to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Wright

customer_reviews.title: Crush your cubes first
customer_reviews.text: Actually I love it. Only disappointment is I can't get at all that lovely smoothie stuck behind the blade. If you add ice, crush it first, it doesn't like cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Steven Mavin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to use. You just have to remember to put in enough liquid before you blitz. Two sizes of cups provided with a handle too. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Didny last
customer_reviews.text: It was great whilst it lasted, unfortunately after a month of using it 3-4times a week it stopped blending and started emitting smoke. Unfortunately I have to return it for a refund. Not sure wether I want another one. Kind of scared it will happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and does everything you think it can do!makes amazing smoothy and amazing quality. this is my 2nd one the first I've had for 3 years! well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter and shes pleased as it's much easier to use than her juicer. It was well packaged and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best piece of kitchen kit ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for my son, as we have had ours many years. I cannot fault these! They are an amazing piece of kit & pulverise every bit of the fruit or vegetable so that you can drink all the goodness! I wouldn’t be without mine!
customer_reviews.author: Vick-Angel

customer_reviews.title: Bought as birthday present - well received
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months ago as a birthday gift, still very satisfied.. it can be a little difficult to clean depending on what you use it for.. it would be ideal if it had a small hole so some steam would escape, so easier to do soup etc. but that's not really what it's for. Great with frozen ingredients as well as fresh.. make sure you wait until the blades stop spinning before removing it from the motor otherwise you risk damaging the roters.
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: a good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a first generation Nutrabullet which gave up the ghost recently. the motor is more powerful so it doesn't take as long to do my regular juicing. well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: dorian jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works really well to blitz up even harder to break down foods like kale and spinach. Is equally good for making green smoothies as it is milkshakes, we find a use for it every day and absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Steel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Hi bought this as a gift for my partner who has only just opened it and have found that the tall cup has a small crack like shatter in it and the actual blender has small knocks on it. The cable was not tied up and things weren't in plastic bags. It was as if it had been returned and someone else had already used it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait this long?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how my life would be without this blender from now on. I've replaced my boring breakfasts for nice smoothies. I began consuming veggies such as kale and spinach in my smoothies and now I consume more fruits as I am not afraid to buy them frozen (they are perfect for this high speed blender and last longer than fresh fruits).
customer_reviews.author: Weslei

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Hi I have a Nutribullet and it is great. However this is my second one and when it came it did not work. It was Christmas gift for my kids. Amazon allow returns but the onus is still on me to go to a post office and print the label and send it back. Very disappointing that it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: POB

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old one after blades snapped after about 2 years, love this product, will take some beating.
customer_reviews.author: cat woman

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance addition
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday for a fruit/veg smoothie it is so easy to use and has made us eat so much more fruit. I freeze the fruit and the Nutribullet easily blends, chops and grinds ingredients with ease. Would definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MF100

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome easy to use gadget. Comes with smoothie ingredients list Heavy good quality metal. Not overly noisy
customer_reviews.author: Melo B

customer_reviews.title: Good power and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with this item. Had one which was about £15 less bought three years ago and was woefully underpowered compared to this. Its like a porche compared with the old machine. Decent accessories too.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he has gone off food lately so I thought I would make him some nutritious drinks to fill him up and get some vitamins into him. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! Love my morning smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product for the price. Very quick blending with harder vegetables blended within a couple of pulses. Quite loud but quieter than some other blenders. Very very easy to clean. Compact design and looks nice on the kitchen bench, doesn’t take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Kim29

customer_reviews.title: Why have I waited so long!
customer_reviews.text: I've been told several times over the past few years that I should get a Nutribullet but I just didn't see the point, as I already had another larger blender. I spotted this one recently and got in on a whim. So easy to use and I adore how much easier it is to clean then a blender, I'm making so many more recipes just based on that alone, cleaning a larger blender was always a chore. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Bee

customer_reviews.title: Multiple faults
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this purchase. Started when small leaks appearing on the underside of the blender unit/blade part. Stuck with it untill I noticed the rubber seal was broke. Stuck with it by replacing the rubber seal. Also complained to amazon. But now the blender does not leak but has a spinning issue and does not spin the blades. Looks as if something has come loose or broke. I use this once a day for a smoothie. Didnt last 3months.
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: Decent Blender
customer_reviews.text: I have had this blender for half a year. It pulverises raw ingredients for mixed smoothies such as vegetables and fruits extremely well. Good for frozen smoothies, dressings and for blending small portions of soup bases. I like the 2 cup compartments which are very handy if wanting small or large amounts. Best for 1-2 person portion usage.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: great product, no issues at all. Easy to use, easy to clean, clear instructions. people have mentioned issues with leaking but if you screw the blade unit on properly absolutely no problems at all Love it.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Quality is outstanding highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought one before gave one to my daughter had to replace? Good for soup smoothy grinder so useful in the kitchen highly recommend to all cannot work without my nuitbulit
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know what I would do without it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this blender everyday for the pass month and can I just say it’s really a life saver! Forget having a hefty blender just invest in one of these! I make a smoothie and juices everyday for my family. I’ve made soups, hummus blended whatever I needed blended without looking at my actually food processor! It’s perfect every kitchen needs it. It’s also very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

product_meta.title: NutriBullet 600 Series Blender, 600 W, 8-Piece set, Black (Black)
product_meta.description: The NutriBullet is the phenomenally popular Nutrition Extractor loved by millions around the UK! NutriBullet’s powerful 600W motor and cyclonic technology creates delicious NutriBlasts by breaking down fruits, vegetables, nuts and even ice through the turbo Extractor Blade. It pulverises stems, seeds and skins where some of the usually neglected essential nutrition lies, providing a fast and easy way to contribute to your Five-a-Day! The NutriBullet Nutrition Extractor rivals traditional juicing and blending methods by breaking down stems, seeds and skins for a smoother drinking experience. Easy to use – simply load the Tall Cup, place on the High Torque Power Base and twist and lock into place. The NutriBullet Extractor Blade turns at an incredible 20,000 RPM to completely break down ingredients into a delicious pulp free, NutriBlast with a smooth consistency. Crushes ice, bursts open seeds, cracks through stems, and shreds tough skins to help you consume the normally unused nutrition. Powerful 600W Bullet Exclusive Cyclonic motor. Sleek and compact – Perfect size for your kitchen countertop. Quick and easy to clean – Simply rinse under warm water. The Tall Cup is also Dishwasher Safe. The NutriBullet Tall Cup is BPA Free. We recommend you replace your NutriBullet Extractor Blade at least every six months, depending on your frequency of use, to ensure optimal performance.

It pulverises stems, seeds and skins where some of the usually neglected essential nutrition lies, providing a fast and easy way to contribute to your Five-a-Day!
